The Merkaba Fields of Earth, Phantom Earth, Tara and Gaia, which merged through Earth’s six Stellar Activations, separate and the planetary magnetic fields, that had collapsed during the 3-day period, regenerate, sealing Earth, Phantom Earth, Tara and Gaia into their respec- tive dimensional time continuum cycles. The grids of Earth, Phantom Earth and Tara begin to separate, as the particle pulsation rhythms of each planet adjust to their respective time cycle rhythms and human popula- tions adjust to their new reality fields on Tara, Bridge Zone Earth and 227
